description.narrative: The revised PDO is as follows: To facilitate the development of the housing finance market through the provision of medium and long-term liquidity to lenders.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Act.V.5.01 (f) | Description :a model framework Participation Agreement between TMRC and potential PMLs has beenadopted and is acceptable to the Association. | Due Date :30-Jun-2010
Finance Agreement :Art.V. 5.01 (a) | Description :the Subsidiary Agreement has been executed between the Recipient and the ProjectImplementing Entity; | Due Date :30-Jun-2010
Finance Agreement :Art.V.5.01 (b) | Description :the Project Implementing Entity has adopted the Operations Manual, in a form andsubstance satisfactory to the Association; | Due Date :30-Jun-2010

Finance Agreement :Art.V.5.01 (c) | Description :a Sub-financing Agreement between the Project Implementing Entity and the TMRC hasbeen legally concluded and is acceptable to the Association; | Due Date :30-Jun-2010
Finance Agreement :Art.V.5.01 (d) | Description :the business plan for the TMRC has been adopted with composition, mandate andresources acceptable to the Association; | Due Date :30-Jun-2010

Finance Agreement :Art.V.5.01 (e) | Description :the constitution of the board of directors and the recruitment of senior officers(CEO, CFO and COO) for the TMRC has been finalized, with composition, mandate and resources acceptable to the Associat | Due Date:30-Jun-2010

Finance Agreement :FA- Article IV, 4.01(b). | Description :The charter of TMRC will be restrictive so as to make it a singlepurpose vehicle for such purpose. The FA includes a negative covenant/remedy that the TMRC charter will not be amended, etc. |Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :FA- Article IV, 4.01(b)Contd. | Description :without the Association's prior written approval. | Frequency:Yearly

Finance Agreement :FA-Art.IV.4.01(c)and PA - Sch.Sec.1 C.1.(a) | Description :The PA and FA also contain a negative covenant/remedythat no signed Participation Agreement will be amended, etc without the Association's prior written approval | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :FA-Sch.2, Sec.IVB.(1)(c)Cont. | Description :Thus, this component does not trigger OP 4.01. In contrast, as thepotential HMFF - once its design is chosen and set to be established and operationalized - potentially will be providing loans to |Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :FA-Sch.2, Sec.IVB.(1)(c)Cont. | Description :borrowers, no monies will be disbursed for this until an assessmentwhether the financial intermediary loan [FIL] requirements of OP 4.01 should apply to the HMFF See FA at Schedule 2, Section IV B |Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :PA -Sch. Sec. I A. 1. (a)(G). | Description :Regarding security for TMRC Mortgage Refinancing, the OperationsManual shall require delivery to TMRC of a satisfactory legal opinion of an acceptable legal counsel confirming the validity |Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :PA -Sch. Sec. I A. 1. (a)(G). | Description :of the assignment/pledge/charge and its opposability to thirdparties | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :PA-Art.II,2.03(b)&FA-Sch.2, Sec.IVB.(1)(c) | Description :Re the applicability of safeguards to Part 1, the TMRCmortgage liquidity facility will be used exclusively to refinance ML provided by primary mortgage lenders and not for any otherpurpose. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Sch.2,Sec.IV,B1(b)(i) | Description :(i) the Project Implementing Entity has adopted a regulatory framework forhousing mortgage finance that is acceptable to the Association; | Due Date :30-Jun-2011

Finance Agreement :Sch.2,Sec.IV,B1(b)(ii) | Description :(ii) the TMRC has been certified OP 8.30 compliant by the Association andhas adopted governance principles and processes acceptable to the Association; | Due Date :30-Jun-2010
Finance Agreement :Sch.2,Sec.IV,B1(b)(iii) | Description :(iii) the TMRC has defined its financial strategy and financial productsthat are acceptable to the Association; | Due Date :30-Jun-2011
Finance Agreement :Sch.2,Sec.IV,B1(b)(iv) | Description :(iv) the TMRC has adopted a risk management strategy acceptable to theAssociation; | Due Date :30-Jun-2011
Finance Agreement :Sch.2,Sec.IV,B1(b)(v) | Description :(v) the Project Implementing Entity has duly authorized and licensed theTMRC as a financial institution; and | Due Date :30-Jun-2011
Finance Agreement :Sch.2,Sec.IV,B1(b)(vi) | Description :(vi) full capitalization of the TMRC by PML shareholders. | Due Date:30-Jun-2011
Finance Agreement :Sch.2,Sec.IV,B1(c)(i) | Description :(i) the HMFF has been legally established in a manner satisfactory to theAssociation; | Due Date :30-Sep-2013

Finance Agreement :Sch.2,Sec.IV,B1(c)(ii) | Description :(ii) there has been an appraisal of the fiduciary arrangements for theadministration of the HMFF that is acceptable to the Association; | Due Date :30-Sep-2013
Finance Agreement :Sch.2,Sec.IV,B1(c)(iii) | Description :(iii) certification by the Association that HMFF has become OP 8.30compliant and | Due Date :30-Sep-2013

Finance Agreement :Sch.2,Sec.IV,B1(c)(iv) | Description :(iv) there has been an assessment whether the financial intermediary loan[FIL] requirements of OP 4.01 should apply to the HMFF; and | Due Date :30-Sep-2013
Finance Agreement :Sch.2,Sec.IV,B1(d) | Description :Category 3) unless MLHHSD has adopted a new business plan for NHC that isacceptable to the Association. | Due Date :30-Jun-2010
